Home.aboutMeTitle: Your AI-Powered Developer – From Vision to Reality
Home.aboutMeContentParagraph01: Hey there! I'm Tibor Végh, a full stack developer with a DevOps mindset and a relentless passion for AI-driven automation, chatbots, and digital transformation. If you're looking for someone who doesn’t just build things but brings them to life, you’ve landed in the right place!
Home.aboutMeContentParagraph02: I help businesses – from startups to established enterprises – turn complex ideas into smooth, scalable, and automated solutions. Whether it’s:

list: ✅ AI-powered chatbots that charm your customers while working 24/7 (no coffee breaks, no sick days).
✅ Custom-built applications that simplify operations and boost efficiency.
✅ E-commerce and business platforms that don’t just exist but sell and engage.
✅ Automated scheduling, CRM, and tracking systems to make management effortless.
✅ DevOps & cloud solutions so you never have to worry about infrastructure headaches.
🚀 AI-first mindset – The future belongs to automation, and I make sure you're ahead of the curve.
🔧 End-to-end development – From brainstorming to deployment, I handle everything.
🤝 Clear communication – I break down even the most complex tech concepts so they make sense, even if you're not an IT guru.
💡 30+ years of experience – If there’s a tech challenge, I’ve probably solved it before (and if not, I love a good puzzle).
🔥 Reliable, efficient, and fun to work with – No tech jargon overload, no ghosting, just solutions that work.

Home.aboutMeContentParagraph06: I design, build, deploy, and maintain AI-driven systems that save time, increase efficiency, and make businesses smarter.
Home.aboutMeContentParagraph08: 📩 Get in touch today and let’s automate, innovate, and grow your business with AI!
Home.footer: Abonnez-vous à la chaîne The JavaScript Way et découvrez NextJS, ReactJS et MERN.

Hero.quotesLine2: But someone who knows AI might.
